review: I had an excellent experience at Dr. Naresh and Dr.Harsha‚Äôs dental clinic. The dentists were extremely knowledgeable and professional, and they took the time to explain every step of the procedure to me in a clear and concise manner. They made sure that I was comfortable throughout the entire process and felt at ease knowing that I was in good hands. The clinic was clean and well maintained and I appreciate the attention to detail that was evident in every aspect of the practice. Overall I would highly recommend Dr. Naresh and Dr. Harsha‚Äôs dental clinic to everyone in need of dental care in Hyderabad. Thank you for the exceptional service. I apologize for not writing the review earlier.

review: Doctor Naresh is a highly experienced and  patient friendly doctor. He not only extends the best professional services but also ensures patient is comfortable throughout the treatment process. He does a deep Diagnos of the dental issues and suggests with correct treatment like RCT/ Tooth implementation/Extraction etc. His main effort are always to save the tooth. I wish him all the best and recommend those looking forward for dental treatment to Dr. Naresh sir.
